roleset.name: want, crave, desire
roleset.note: DESIRE-V NOTES: Member of VNcls want-32.1-1-1. (from desire.01-v)

example.name: desire-v: not like any ringers I know
example.text: In the torrent of replies that followed, one woman ringer from Solihull observed that ``the average male ringer leaves quite a lot [0]-1 [*trace*-1]-2 to be desired *trace*-2: badly dressed, decorated with acne and a large beer-belly, frequently unwashed and unbearably flatulent in peals.''

example.name: desire-v: active
example.text: Seeking to allay European concerns, U.S. Agriculture Secretary Clayton Yeutter said in Washington that the new U.S. plan wouldn't ``put farmers out of business'' but would encourage them to ``grow what-1 the markets desire *trace*-1 instead of what the government wants.''

example.name: desirous-j
example.text: The boy is desirous of the girl believing him

roleset.name: worthy of wanting
roleset.note: DESIRABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, desire-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls want-32.1-1-1. (from desirable.01-j)

example.name: desirable-j: arg1
example.text: I can understand the argument that nuclear proliferation is bad and any of these states having nuclear weapons is not desirable as it just leads to proliferation in the region , but that argument should have been used against Pakistan and Israel getting nukes .
example.arg: any of these states having nuclear weapons
as it just leads to proliferation in the region
